paragraphs.text: Please let it be so- and with maximum penalties. This administration has done more internal harm to this country in less time than anyone since the South fired on Ft. Sumter.

cb516a474fba.title: What is lacking in this whole cloud of McCarthyite BS is something that the Russian government is…

paragraphs.text: What is lacking in this whole cloud of McCarthyite BS is something that the Russian government is alleged to have done that affected the election.

paragraphs.text: And, if that ever turns up, some evidence that the Russian government actually did it.

47d2b50ee8ef.title: He’s got the evidence but it’s secret and he can’t share it with us because that could compromise…

paragraphs.text: He’s got the evidence but it’s secret and he can’t share it with us because that could compromise national security which would be bad. Shhhhhhhh. It’s another case of “trust me”
paragraphs.name: 3c09

paragraphs.text: Ooooh, somebody in trouble!
paragraphs.name: ee61

e77c9a19f17e.title: Wow…..this coming from a man whose wet nurse was Henry Cisneros.

paragraphs.text: Wow…..this coming from a man whose wet nurse was Henry Cisneros. Both scum bags from the same cut of cloth. Not sure how he was named to the “intelligence committee”. Would have thought that he would be much more effective on the “entitlement committee”. Just make sure Joaquin, that your girl “Nobody Nothing” Rice appears and testifies under oath…
paragraphs.name: bab1

2d2500d4d241.title: Clearly a political ploy, assume guilt before a single witness is talked to, this is all part of…

paragraphs.text: Clearly a political ploy, assume guilt before a single witness is talked to, this is all part of the new scorched earth campaign by Democrats to try and damage Trump any way possible even if they have to lie and cheat and hurt innocent people and Americans in general.
Lock em all up.
paragraphs.name: 2be4

paragraphs.text: Nice try ThinkProgress. It’s too bad that your fake news organization’s attempt to elevate Rep. Joaquin Castro’s salacious comments into a diversionary headline is contradicted by statements aired two days ago by the House Intelligence Committee’s top Democrat, Rep. Adam Schiff. When asked if there was any evidence of Trump-Russia collusion in the…

6c4a332ca63d.title: Whomever it was in the White House who set up the Nunes stunt should be put in jail.

paragraphs.text: Whomever it was in the White House who set up the Nunes stunt should be put in jail. They were mishandling classified information for political purposes and intentionally tried to deceive a congressional committee by having Nunes claim he received the information from a whistleblower type. Nunes also gave a lot of flimsy excuses why he would not…
